question: As per a recent BofA report, what is the average consumer price index during October 2016-March 2020?
explanation:
As per the recent report from the Bank of America Securities India, the Reserve Bank of India has achieved a consumer price index averaging 3.9% during October 2016-March 2020.
The monetary policy framework was fixed by the RBI before five years as inflation target of 4 per cent with a 2% deviation. It is set to review the framework for the first time in 5 years.
